articles.description: Deutsche Telekom <DTEGn.DE> said on Monday it had successfully tested an aerial base station in the earth's stratosphere, an innovation it hopes will bring mobile coverage to remote areas that are hard for ground-based networks to reach.
articles.content:
By Douglas Busvine
BERLIN (Reuters) - Deutsche Telekom DTEGn.DE said on Monday it had successfully tested an aerial base station in the earth's stratosphere, an innovation it hopes will bring mobile… [+2748 chars]
